main event: A woman from Twin Lakes spotted a large white light that changed to a bluish-white as it dropped into a wooded area between Lake and University Roads on December 12, 1962.
interesting points: The light dropped to the earth in about 5 seconds., A fisherman in Milan reported seeing a saucer-shaped object land and a small man emerge from it before it took off., John Liedtke, a welder, reported sparks flying from a mysterious object that exploded in a gravel pit in Tacoma-Seattle on December 19, 1962., Witnesses in Milan saw a saucer with a flat oval aluminum-colored appearance and two hemispherical structures., The Seattle Post-Intelligencer reported a perfectly round hole, 15 feet across, where the mysterious object had landed in Tacoma, WA.
sighted object: large white light, saucer-shaped object, mysterious object
